shop.name: Shop
shop.desc: Buy stuff made by me like wallpapers, apps, etc.

rover.name: Rover
rover.desc: Generates redirect links for a static site from a custom file format with super easy syntax.

freebutworsegpt.name: FreeButWorseGPT
freebutworsegpt.desc: Free chatbot that supports mermaid, syntax highlighting, laTex, markdown, STT and stores data locally.

inkless.name: Inkless
inkless.desc: Minimal, lightweight (less than 4 MB), shortcut-based text editor. You can use it for writing notes or coding.

awesome-free-apps.name: Awesome Free Apps
awesome-free-apps.desc: Curated list of the best free apps for PC and mobile.

keylock.name: Keylock
keylock.desc: App to lock input from your keyboard and mouse.

urlmskr.name: Urlmskr
urlmskr.desc: Mask unlimited URLs for free. There's also an API to generate masked URLs.

tkforge.name: TkForge
tkforge.desc: Convert Figma design into a working Python GUI.

kamipass.name: Kamipass
kamipass.desc: Secure spreadsheet like password manager with plugins.

tierdesc.name: tierdesc
tierdesc.desc: Tool made to list tier benefits in descriptions in platforms like Patreon.

winpower.name: Winpower
winpower.desc: Allows you to set a custom screen off and sleep time. Also has power related settings grouped together along with a scripting system.

nanabox.name: Nanabox
nanabox.desc: Upload unlimited files without login. Also has a local API, history and allows custom hosts.

livewinsize.name: Livewinsize
livewinsize.desc: Visualize window size in pixels and other units. Useful for developers.

clearmydiscordhistory.name: ClearMyDiscordHistory
clearmydiscordhistory.desc: Delete your DM or server history from Discord.
